description: The BGP Established event is generated when
the BGP FSM enters the ESTABLISHED state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpEstablished ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerRemoteAddr a 192.0.2.1 ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerLastError s EX ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerState i 1 ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerVrfId i 9999

description: The remote IP address of this entry's BGP
peer.
variables.name: ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerRemoteAddr

description: The last error code and subcode seen by this
peer on this connection. If no error has
occurred, this field is zero. Otherwise, the
first byte of this two byte OCTET STRING
contains the error code, and the second byte
contains the subcode.
variables.name: ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerLastError

description: The BGP peer connection state.
variables.name: ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerState

description: The name of the VRF the interface belong to
variables.name: ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerVrfId

description: The BGPBackwardTransition Event is generated
when the BGP FSM moves from a higher numbered
state to a lower numbered state.

event.Summary: BGP FSM in $v3 state during backward transition

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpBackwardTransition ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerRemoteAddr a 192.0.2.1 ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerLastError s EX ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerState i 1 ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerVrfId i 9999

description: The remote IP address of this entry's BGP
peer.
variables.name: ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerRemoteAddr

description: The last error code and subcode seen by this
peer on this connection. If no error has
occurred, this field is zero. Otherwise, the
first byte of this two byte OCTET STRING
contains the error code, and the second byte
contains the subcode.
variables.name: ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerLastError

description: The BGP peer connection state.
variables.name: ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerState

description: The name of the VRF the interface belong to
variables.name: ONEACCESS-BGP4-MIB::oacbgpPeerVrfId
